details.sectionContent: This event will test the thinking ability and technical knowledge of the participants.
The event is based on the formation of technical words with fun.

‣	This round will test the knowledge of the participants about technical terms.

‣	Participants will be provided crossword and they have to solve it.

‣	Judging criteria will be based on the number of correct answers.

‣	This round is based on the application of the hierarchical data.

‣	The participants will be provided the word by which they have to get the correct code.

‣	There will be some twist in finding the code which will be disclosed at the time of the Event.

‣	Judging criteria is based on the given time limit and correct code.

‣	In the final round, participants will be provided7-10 path of files.

‣	The participants have to find alphabets by accessing different files.The files will be accessed by solving different problems.

‣	The process will be repeated for number of times and by using different alphabets they have to form technical word/s.

‣	Judging criteria is based on correct word and on the basis of time.
